contentList.content: Toggle the mod on/off without uninstalling it.
0 = Off, 1 = Error, 2 = Warn, 3 = Info, 4 = Debug, 5 = Trace (Debug and Trace can be extremely performance intensive under certain circumstances - use info unless debugging something)

Whether to enable Entity Property Recorder, which records the properties that AIM can use in its ItemFilters when items are picked up or characters join the party/are in it on activation/level load. Turn off when not using!
Redistribute Consumables On Use During Combat
Whether to allow AIM to re-distribute the party's consumable items when they're used - i.e. drinking a small healing potion will redistribute all small healing potions
Distribute Items If Picked Up During Combat
Whether to allow AIM to process a picked-up item during combat - i.e. if Heat Metal forced you to drop your sword, you would want it to just go to the person who picked it up
Whether to allow AIM to process the party's inventory on level load - only matters to existing saves that added AIM mid-way
